house_listing.house_description: This 1 level detached single family home built in 1923 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 1 car detached garage and approximately 1176 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, living room, bonus room. Features include view, patio.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Dining Room, Living Room
